website_summaries.verdict: Decent quality meat injector kit for a good price. Definitely a good kit to get anyone started.
pros: Stainless-steel set that includes three needles
Easy to use and clean and great for anyone looking to get started with a variety of types of meat
cons: The threads are more fragile than on more expensive sets
Some also reported having trouble using minced marinades with the larger needle

website_summaries.verdict: Built to last for several generations – unlike a plastic model. Some consumers find it challenging to clean, but it's solid in the hand and easy to control.
pros: Heavy-duty metal construction and exceptionally long needles
Chunky marinades do not clog needles
cons: Needle can snap off at the threads under pressure
Difficult to clean, even though dishwasher safe
Parts may not be 100% stainless steel

customer_reviews.title: Must-have tool for pitmasters and would-be chefs in the kitchen!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this a couple of times already...can make a mess when injecting brisket, and I find the nozzle with multiple wholes works faster, but tends to waste a lot more liquid...so I pretty much just use the standard nozzle. But if you are injecting a really big roast or bird, I could see how the multi-hole nozzle would save a LOT of time. Regardless, this works like a charm, the cylinder doesn't leak. All in all, it's a must-have for pitmasters and cooks!!
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Very well made injector!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is one nice injector! It is heavy weight metal- no cheap plastic on sight! It worked great for injecting our Thanksgiving turkey with seasonings. I was also able to put it in the dishwasher without a problem. The ends of the needles are wider, so it didn't fall through the cracks on the silverware drawer. Be sure to lubricate it with a little bit of olive or vegetable oil before you try to use it or else it is kind of hard to get the plunger up and down.
customer_reviews.author: H. KITE

customer_reviews.title: Poor Durability and NO Support
customer_reviews.text: The o-ring broke and have received no response from manufacturer after sending two emails. This is a $.25 part that makes the device useless when it breaks. Don't waste you're money!
customer_reviews.author: Homer

customer_reviews.title: Great for making lip balm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for filling lip balm tubes and it has been great so far. I was using a cheap plastic syringe but the rubber stopper kept popping in the middle and making a mess. This is much sturdier and easier to clean, although the long injector is a bit obnoxious to clean. Luckily I have long brushes that fit. For anyone else using this for lip balms, one trick is to make sure that it is warm before using or the balm will cool while in it and it won't come out.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Judge

customer_reviews.title: great item..
customer_reviews.text: I have bought cheap plastic one that never lasted. They also hold the food bacteria, even when cleaned. This is a great item and well worth the price. I used it to inject turkey breast with butter, pork tenderloins with apple juice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: This Marinade Injector Really is Heavy-Duty and Super Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a marinade injector before, this one is easy to use and I particularly love the needle that has all the little holes, it seemed to really spread around the marinade all throughout the meat. I've used it to cook a large roast beef and I used it before barbecuing a chicken, they both turned out superbly. This in injector really is heavy duty and super easy to clean, I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ND Capra

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Used it Thanksgiving to inject the bird. Upon washing the short tip, I lost the oring down the sink. I sent out an email and got a response the following day; Apko is sending out a replacement. I questioned if there was a replacement kit I could buy but was told they offered none. In a short while I had a tracking number. The unit is well made, easy to use and with the kind of support I received, defineately a best buy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Package was Open - Had to Return
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because we couldn't use it, but it appeared fairly solid. The package was opened and I wasn't comfortable using a kitchen tool and paying full price for it without knowing if it had been used.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: He uses it for infusing garlic under the skin of lamb roasts and the like. If that's what you need
customer_reviews.text: My husband, the cook, packs this tool in his suitcase when we travel and he might encounter a meal to cook. He uses it for infusing garlic under the skin of lamb roasts and the like. If that's what you need, I recommend it. (We tried some plastic ones, but they aren't durable enough for our uses.)
customer_reviews.author: N. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Marinades that have solid items like seeds etc, can clog smaller needles.......
customer_reviews.text: ........however there is a very large needle provided in the kit does the trick. The unit is of very good quality and works great with "all liquid" marinades & wines. Loading the syringe takes some practice but not a big deal. The manufacturer should offer a storage case so you can keep the syringe & 3 needles together......I used an elastic band....just me.....one last thing.....once you get rock'en and roll'in with this unit, careful not to poke through the meat and into your hand!....I did..! Too much wine at the time.....lol....buy it!..... meats and chicken taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Washes easily.
customer_reviews.text: Truly heavy duty. It's a lot bigger and the needles are thick and sharp. This injector can handle tender and tough meats. It pierces without hesitation. Just don't squeeze the plunger while piercing or you'll have quite the mess everywhere. Washes easily.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Pre-seasoned with metal flints; Clean thoroughly before use
customer_reviews.text: While the injector itself is good, it comes with metal flints and lubricants coated on the inside. Cleaning this thing is a PITA since you need to clean the inside of the needles too. This is absolutely unacceptable for a kitchen utensil. PBKay, please talk to your manufactures about food safety.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: I HOPE that the actual product holds up to be a truthfully good??
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be OK except it wasn't as pictured. It only came with two needle. One was long and one was medium. My life will go on but it is deceiving advertising. I HOPE that the actual product holds up to be a truthfully good ???
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, high-quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Worked great for injecting a large pork-butt and brisket prior to smoking. Also worked great at sucking-up hot drippings, to use as a meat-baster while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty injector
customer_reviews.text: This really is a heavy duty injector and in the hands of someone who knew what they were doing, it probably would be perfect. First try at injecting a turkey was semi-successful. As a suggestion, don't make or use a marinade that contains crushed herbs. They need to be finely ground if you use them at all. Otherwise, it clogs.
customer_reviews.author: xsentrik

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of leaks.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and heavy duty. but how do you fill it without leaking? Not filling it from the top wide spot with the needle plugged because once you start filling it, the fluid comes out of the injector holes! So you attach the plunge handle first then fill it at the small site where the needle is inserted. A funnel would have been nice. I do like the multi holes at the injection tip and would give this another try.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Soo Hoo

customer_reviews.title: High-Quality and Solidly Dependable
customer_reviews.text: I'm sick of all the cheap plastic injectors, and this is a great replacement. Used quite successfully this past Thanksgiving, so not yet sure about longevity, but it seems to be very solid and durable, and it doesn't bend or leak. Happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. LeCour

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TURKEY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this injector to create a herb concoction to inject into my turkey for thanksgiving. It worked perfectly and the flavor I injected was delivered throughout.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: I use these to inject broth or apple juice in poultry and roasts. This one injects easily and is comfortable to hold. Liquid doesn't spurt out around the edges. Put it in the dishwasher on the top shelf with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Fill puppy toys with peanut butter!
customer_reviews.text: I know this isn't what it is designed for?! However I use it to fill my dogs toys with Peanut Butter! It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Richard OHagan

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the silicone ring surrounding the base of the syringe broke after just a few months of use. Without the silicone, the syringe cannot create a seal or draw the marinade into the syringe's cavity. I'm so disappointed because the syringe, up to that point, had been working perfectly! Amazon delivered the item on Jan 5 and it broke in Feb - just outside of my 30-day return window.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie F.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well built
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well built, simple injector. No leaks and easy to use. Purchased a fancier option a few years back and it was garbage. This stainless steel injector is well priced and seems to built to last.
customer_reviews.author: portlandsmoke

customer_reviews.title: Very solid. Does great job.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for injecting wine and herbs into turkeys and roasts. Really like the way I can inject thick honey and lime juice into birds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We injected a delicious marinade and everyone loved it. You could also see the herbs and ...
customer_reviews.text: Our thanksgiving turkey was a HIT! We injected a delicious marinade and everyone loved it. You could also see the herbs and garlic speckled throughout the meat. It made for a delicious and moist turkey. Going to do this every year for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Meghana Raja

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has three different needles .. works out great
customer_reviews.author: Paul Weeks

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. This is a heavy duty injector. I cook and smoke a lot. This is a must have for anyone who smokes meat. It holds up well and aids with injecting liquids and herbs into anything from Prime Rib to a pork butt. One needle is specifically for liquids and the other can inject herbs and minced garlic. Watch the needle points as they are extremely sharp.
customer_reviews.author: E. Krones

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, bought item not used just yet but I will.
customer_reviews.author: Lee G. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet, but is very strong and I am confident it's perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lambo Bob

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty Injector
customer_reviews.text: By far, the best injector for casual users. The capacity of liquid it has is fairly nice and it feels very sturdy and filled with quality. Cleaning it is fairly difficult and it will take some time.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan B.

customer_reviews.title: than this will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to inject turkeys, found it just to be ok. If you need a reasonably priced turkey injector, than this will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time

customer_reviews.title: Great injector
customer_reviews.text: I injected so much butter into my turkey day turkey with this thing. Very solidly built, nice seals, and the two different "needles" are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect! The small parts are a little hard to clean but worth it
customer_reviews.author: natasha larkin

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This product worked perfectly for our turkey. I really liked that it has several different syringes so it gives you many options with your marinades. Very high quality item!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Beliveau

customer_reviews.title: Great. In my opinion,  avoid Tradewonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and awsome. Side note, caution if purchasing products from Tradewonderful. In my opinion, when you press buy, thats it. Your done. No help from ANYONE!!! My opinion about my nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: shawn eckert

customer_reviews.title: Works well wish I had a case
customer_reviews.text: Please love these but you should only purchase injectors with cases. These things can be dangerous if just left in a draw and/or unconcealed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: This has 2 different tips with it, this item makes light work of marinade / brining... It's amazing how such a small little tool, can make such a great difference in food quality!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Fairlamb

customer_reviews.title: Solid and reliable tool!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this tool for several mo the to inject pork butts before I smoke them. It’s easy to use, even for my small hands. The gasket never gets stuck and I really like the different needles that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Currey

customer_reviews.title: ... last for a few generations it is made so good. Being made out of stainless steel it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Meat injector should last for a few generations it is made so good. Being made out of stainless steel it is easy to clean. I was pleasantly surprised on how well the piece was. It indeed is heavy. It is a MUST HAVE for anyone smoking or grilling.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hamers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everything. Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: GREAT! I use it to marinade a turkey while I grill it. The cheap ones cannot hold up to the hot fluid I take from the pan to reinject into the turkey.
customer_reviews.author: JLV

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality injector!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! This injector is very high quality. Truthfully should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: ELC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy! Be careful not to go to far when you are injecting... I got butter all over.
customer_reviews.author: MorbidMom

customer_reviews.title: This thing makes me feel like some kind of evil scientist on thanksgiving
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes me feel like some kind of evil scientist on thanksgiving. It's really heavy duty and no worries about this one not doing the job. My Thanksgiving turkey last year was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sure I'll have it for years if I keep ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing was much heavier than I expected. I'm pretty sure I'll have it for years if I keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty it is. Normally I'd break one before ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty it is. Normally I'd break one before I even finish cooking one hog. Not this one, plus it did not plug up while using. That's a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: For the price, was expecting a very light, flimsy product, NOPE, this is real deal, heavy duty, 3 injection tools, worked awesomely for my fried bird, wish I’d gotten this sooner
customer_reviews.author: Dewitt Raley

customer_reviews.title: Durable product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for many years, this new one was to replace one that was 8 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Strong
customer_reviews.text: Very rugged, won't break like the plastic ones. Has multiple needles with different lengths and sizes. Works on large and small meats and can inject thick liquids with the large size needles.
customer_reviews.author: RONALD C RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: for the price the quality seems very good and sturdy. I injected some scallops i was smoking with some butter to keep them from drying out - worked really well!
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Best for smoking meat
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this injector. Easy to use, easy to clean, and makes our smoked meat so tender and juicy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Abbott

customer_reviews.title: evenly distributes marinade throughout meat
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, easy to clean, evenly distributes marinade throughout meat keeping it all flavorful and moist
customer_reviews.author: L. Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it to grease ball fittings on my car
customer_reviews.author: James U.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Execellent product, I use it to Inyect pork and meat. Strong product
customer_reviews.author: M Alfonzo

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it but love that it is sturdy stainless steel and easy to clean. Plastic injectors tend to split in time and get air leaks that prevent correct filling of the injector which this one should not do
customer_reviews.author: jkwayne

customer_reviews.title: Inject more flavour
customer_reviews.text: This product really works well. I like the robust silicone seal, which did its job just fine. I picked up a Costco rotisserie chicken, which is usually under cooked, and injected it with half a cup of warm mango juice infused with a lot of Indian spices. It turned out just terrific. This meat injector replaces a broken plastic one, and is wayyyy better. Stainless-steel is the best way to go. The included, two different 'needles' work well. When injecting the single hole needle pull it out a tiny bit before pressing the plunger - works like a charm! I would highly recommend this product, & spend the extra money over the plastic units.
customer_reviews.author: cyman

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, used it for Thanksgiving turkey and was able to inject liquid into the meat. Kept the turkey moist and full of flavor. Seems very sturdy. Hope to use for a long time, I highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality.  Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This injector is heavy duty and the two needles are strong and work great. The only down side is that the needles are difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This injector exceeded my expectations; it is a quality product, built to last, and works great. Even the threading is fine and seals the unit perfectly. If I had to find one complaint, it is a bit hard to fill without spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Consider this commercial grade injection set.
customer_reviews.text: Commercial grade construction. Easy to use and clean. Worked well for injecting turkey.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I like to inject my kids with vinegar. Thumbs up highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Made.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to use it. But overall looks nice and quality made.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. I use it to inject oil ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I use it to inject oil salad dressing in a brisket. It has no problems and doesn't get clogged when using the larger opening needle.
customer_reviews.author: MHWsussex

customer_reviews.title: Simple, well made
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly. So much better than brine alone. Shallot Infused olive oils injected in chicken is seriously good.

customer_reviews.title: After dealing with the crappy plastic ones
customer_reviews.text: Beast! After dealing with the crappy plastic ones, this thing is a solid beast...doesn't get stuck, somewhat easy to clean...but it does its job w/no issues
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to use, and high quality metal. This product made preparing our turkey easy and fun. Clean up was easy and fast.

customer_reviews.title: Great For Roasts & Turkey
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Use it often. However keeping needle clean is a bit difficult but doe able. Good purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Works terrific
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy-duty injector. I used it to inject my Meats when I put them on a pellet Grill. It'll come in handy when I inject my turkeys in the fall.

customer_reviews.title: I loved it, wife hated it
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, wife hated it. It looks like something from a horror movie she said. It is well built and doesn't leak. I used it to inject a turkey and a pork butt with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as advertised.......
customer_reviews.text: It was sturdy and easy to clean and use. It is a quality kitchen tool that I will have for a lifetime.

customer_reviews.title: Works great

customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect injector. There were no leaks and it was easy to clean with a bottle brush and hot soapy water.

product_meta.title: Heavy Duty Meat Injector 304 Stainless Steel - 2 Oz Seasoning Injector - Marinade Injector Syringe Includes 3 Needles
product_meta.description:
PBKay Seasoning Injector 

With the new and improved PBKay 2 oz. seasoning injector 
you can now add flavor and zest to all your favorite foods! 
Your grilling and cooking experience will never be the same 
as you can inject large pieces of meat. poultry and fish with 
spices, wine, liquor and all your favorite bottled marinades. 

Made from high quality stainless steel. The injector includes 
two 6" and one 3" needle. The attachment with 12 holes allow for 
injecting liquid seasoning or stock deep into your meat to 
ensure tenderness and the juiciest of flavor. The attachment 
with the larger hole at the end is perfect for thicker 
marinades, mincing, and herbs for best results in maximum flavor. 
The third needle is 3" and is for a more precise injection and for smaller cuts of meat. 






Product features: 

Made from high quality stainless steel 
Penetrates even the toughest meats 
Liquid & minced marinade needles included 
Removable lid for easy filing 
Easy to clean & dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: Made out of high quality stainless steel, will last a long time and will penetrate the toughest cuts of meat.
Includes 2 6" needles, one for liquid marinade and one for minced marinades.
Extremely easy to use and clean -dishwasher safe-
Made to last and includes a 100% satisfaction guarantee -lifetime warranty-

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars613 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
